trans-unit.source: Handle to the ToolTip control (returned by _GUIToolTip_Create.)

seg-source.mrk: Handle to the ToolTip control (returned by _GUIToolTip_Create.)

target.mrk: Handle to the ToolTip control (returned by _GUIToolTip_Create.)

trans-unit.source: The color value used in the _GUIToolTip_SetTipTextColor() function is a COLORREF (BGR) value in the format 0x00bbggrr. The low-order byte contains a value for the relative intensity of red, the second byte contains a value for green, and the third byte contains a value for blue.

seg-source.mrk: The color value used in the _GUIToolTip_SetTipTextColor() function is a COLORREF (BGR) value in the format 0x00bbggrr.
The low-order byte contains a value for the relative intensity of red, the second byte contains a value for green, and the third byte contains a value for blue.

target.mrk: The color value used in the _GUIToolTip_SetTipTextColor() function is a COLORREF (BGR) value in the format 0x00bbggrr.
The low-order byte contains a value for the relative intensity of red, the second byte contains a value for green, and the third byte contains a value for blue.

trans-unit.source: The high-order byte must be zero.

seg-source.mrk: The high-order byte must be zero.

target.mrk: The high-order byte must be zero.

trans-unit.source: If using a Windows theme setting, this will disable that for the tooltip displayed, so you can color it

seg-source.mrk: If using a Windows theme setting, this will disable that for the tooltip displayed, so you can color it

target.mrk: If using a Windows theme setting, this will disable that for the tooltip displayed, so you can color it

trans-unit.source: it has to be placed before you try to actually set the colors, doing it after will reset the colors.

seg-source.mrk: it has to be placed before you try to actually set the colors, doing it after will reset the colors.

target.mrk: it has to be placed before you try to actually set the colors, doing it after will reset the colors.

trans-unit.source: The color value used in the _GUIToolTip_SetTipBkColor function is a COLORREF (BGR) value.

seg-source.mrk: The color value used in the _GUIToolTip_SetTipBkColor function is a COLORREF (BGR) value.

target.mrk: The color value used in the _GUIToolTip_SetTipBkColor function is a COLORREF (BGR) value.

trans-unit.source: The color value used in the _GUIToolTip_SetTipTextColor function is a COLORREF (BGR) value.

seg-source.mrk: The color value used in the _GUIToolTip_SetTipTextColor function is a COLORREF (BGR) value.

target.mrk: The color value used in the _GUIToolTip_SetTipTextColor function is a COLORREF (BGR) value.
